snippet: An immigration appeals judge ordered the government on Monday to release on bail a militant Islamic preacher who is considered a leader of Al Qaeda in Europe.
abstract: Immigration appeals judge orders the British government to release Abu Qatada on bail; he is a militant Islamic preacher who is considered a leader of Al Qaeda in Europe; his real name is Omar Othman and he has spent more than six years in British jails since his arrest after the Sept 11 attacks in the United States,
lead_paragraph: An immigration appeals judge ordered the government on Monday to release on bail a militant Islamic preacher who is considered a leader of Al Qaeda in Europe.

headline.main: Britain: Judge Orders Release on Bail of Militant Accused of Qaeda Role
headline.print_headline: Britain: Judge Orders Release on Bail Of Militant Accused of Qaeda Role
